messages.text: What must be included in a legal demand notice under Section 138?

content.text: Under Section 138 of the Negotiable Instruments Act, 1881, the following elements must be included in a legal demand notice:

items.text: The payee can initiate criminal proceedings by filing a complaint against the drawer of the dishonored cheque due to insfficient funds or exceeding the arrangement.

items: The payee must send a legal demand notice to the drawer within 30 days of the reciving the cheque return memo from the bank.
The drawer has 15 days from the receipt of the notice to make the payment.

items.text: The court may impose imprisonment up to two years or a fine up to twice the amount of the cheque, or both, if the drawer fails to make the payment within the stipulated time.
